players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.
Diana: "Be careful, Charlie is the detective and knows I'm the mafioso. I killed Alice last night."
You: "I'm still silent, but I'm keeping an eye on Charlie. If he tries anything suspicious, I'll report him."
Charlie: "I'm still investigating, but so far no new leads. I'll keep an eye on Diana and be cautious."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
